com.github.dexecutor.core

Class DependentTasksExecutorConfig<T extends Comparable<T>,R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dexecutor.core.DependentTasksExecutorConfig<T,R>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of Node/Task ID
    R - Type of Node/Task result

    public class DependentTasksExecutorConfig<T extends Comparable<T>,R>
extends Object

    Configuration Object for Dexecutor framework. At a minimum it needs ExecutorService and TaskProvider, rest are optional and takes default values

    This provides way to hook in your own Validator and Traversar

    Author:
    Nadeem Mohammad
